      • isAcceptingState

        public boolean isAcceptingState(Set<G> curlyG)
        A state is accepting, if, for a given set of G formulas curlyG, the conjunct of this set implies the formula the state is labelled with.
        Parameters:
        curlyG - The set of formulas of type G
        Returns:
        True, if the state is accepting for curlyG. False otherwise.
